author: Ash Law
text: The more I spend time sa office kay maka remember ko how happy I was I had you as my partner. You inspire me daily, to work harder, to strive harder to reach my goal which was to become a trainer. I remember how you always comfort me basta naa koy DSAT.

author: Ash Law
text: Today, out of the blue, I felt a very familiar feeling-a feeling so nostalgic yet ironic. These thoughts of a million "what ifs" came crashing through my mind. Isa didto kay what if, kami pa sa akong ex karon? Maka learn kaha ko nga okay ra dili mag sigeg update? Nga without it

author: Ash Law
text: Of them together man. I kept on searching and searching even went to linkedin, used google photos until…I saw apicyure of him with a guy naka akbay niya with the caption “kalbo boi”. Stalked the guys and found that he was tagged with this kinda celebrity guy nga isa sya sa

author: Ash Law
text: nakit-an nga iyang account. And then I came across a picture with him and his family with a guy which I think, no, I am sure his supposedly “ex”. Napagtanto nako iya jud tong ex kay with his description tumpak kaayo jud nga mao to ang laki. Pero I haven’t seen any recent pictures

author: Ash Law
text: Out of the blue today, I started searching his name sa fb, I can’t find it just like the last time. While scrolling though, I came across a woman’s account with the same last name so I check her pictures and suddenly I saw him. Stalked further and further kay wala gihapon koy

author: Ash Law
text: Mura syag nag stalk and ng hack jud syag accounts which was shocking. I was scared with his actions. I like him a lot pero with all those things to consider, mas nagpatig babaw akong logic kesa sa emotions. I seriously cannot be with someone nga

author: Ash Law
text: But just like any other stories, its not just full pf sunshines and rainbows. It was also full of red flags. He was still with his boyfriend when he courted/flirted with me. He has some dark past I don’t want to mention which was also kinda shady. He had some cheating incidents

author: Ash Law
text: Intentions towards me. Heck, we even like the same food, same color, same taste when it comes to music. We also graduated with the same course and even the qualities that we’re looking for a person is already there.

author: Ash Law
text: Twas so crazy and too good to be true. Someone like him, liked me. Maybe I was just full of insecurities coz almost every single day I joke around and ask him “when will your kabuang with me ends?”. I was so focus on my insecurities that I forgot the person was genuine with his

author: Ash Law
text: A few months ago I had this crazy whirlwind, short lived romance with a good looking guy with a great physique. Oh damn we hit it off like a skyrocket. Shared numerous information and storied about each other. Planned to do things together and even planned to live together.

author: Ash Law
text: Just a few secs after my m8ing, I saw this advd notification of our Monthsary. I wouldn’t really bother anymore coz I hav totally 4given you and moved on from our dark past but lately, for the past sev weeks or days I should say, you have been constantly calling me. But what if? https://t.co/5SkcOgxToX

author: Ash Law
text: Honestly, I don’t feel like I still have time for another relationship. I’ve enjoyed the last 8 months of not giving a damn about my whereabouts to anyone. It’s like I’m devoid of feelings.

author: Ash Law
text: Funny how you talk against people who k hurt their partners because of unhealed traumas yet ikaw mismo kay maoy gi buhat nako.

author: Ash Law
text: Because traveling is my therapy. https://t.co/KYRoDxzHZp

author: Ash Law
text: Distance and time really helps you to recover and get back on track

author: Ash Law
text: I just wish, hope and pray that people will try to heal from their pst traumas before heading to a new relationship just so they cannot hurt the next person they bump into.

author: Ash Law
text: How could someone say one thing and ends up doing the opposite? Like they can just hurt me with all these lies. I’m so tired of feeling tired and abused.

author: Ash Law
text: Honestly, it has almost completely faded away. Sad but true. I’m at least relieved to finally feel free of the crap that i have been experiencing for almost 2 yrs.

author: Ash Law
text: Dearest Mylove, https://t.co/zvIpU9cu7D

author: Ash Law
text: Happy because it doesn't hurt as bad anymore. Sad because I also don't feel the same intensity of love towards you.

author: Ash Law
text: I'm not even sure if I'm happy or sad. It's confusing.

author: Ash Law
text: Mylove please, stop na. Just stop calling my number. Stop communicating with me. This will just continue the cycle of hate and hurt.

author: Ash Law
text: Always and forever https://t.co/rkCU1iMmPJ

author: Ash Law
text: Always https://t.co/toVEoLos9Z

author: Ash Law
text: I just did https://t.co/t0QEVPyHDY
